item.title: My setup
item.description: Last updated: 08 Nov, 2021 Hardware Operating System Favorite software and customizations Website Photography Hardware My work machine is a Macbook Pro 2019, and I have mixed feelings about it - love its sleek design, hate the mess of connectors. I have a dual 24" monitor setup at work, and a single 24" screen at home. My work is a mix of development and operations, so most of my time is spent within a code editor, a terminal, browser, and a music player.
